description: Gets the details of a specific data set.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the application that this data set is associated with.

parameters.name: dataSetName
parameters.description: The name of the data set.

nested_items.name: blocksize
nested_items.description: The size of the block on disk.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the data set was created.

nested_items.name: dataSetName
nested_items.description: The name of the data set.

nested_items.name: dataSetOrg
nested_items.description: The type of data set. The only supported value is VSAM.

nested_items.name: limit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of generation data sets, up to 255, in a GDG.

nested_items.name: rollDisposition
nested_items.description: The disposition of the data set in the catalog.

nested_items.name: encoding
nested_items.description: The character set encoding of the data set.

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: The format of the data set records.

nested_items.name: encoding
nested_items.description: The character set encoding of the data set.

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: The format of the data set records.

nested_items.name: alternateKeys
nested_items.description: The alternate key definitions, if any. A legacy dataset might not have any alternate key defined, but if those alternate keys definitions exist, provide them as some applications will make use of them.

nested_items.name: allowDuplicates
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the alternate key values are supposed to be unique for the given data set.

nested_items.name: length
nested_items.description: A strictly positive integer value representing the length of the alternate key.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the alternate key.

nested_items.name: offset
nested_items.description: A positive integer value representing the offset to mark the start of the alternate key part in the record byte array.

nested_items.name: cacheAtStartup
nested_items.description: If set to True, enforces loading the data set into cache before it's used by the application.

nested_items.name: compressed
nested_items.description: Indicates whether indexes for this dataset are stored as compressed values. If you have a large data set (typically > 100 Mb), consider setting this flag to True.

nested_items.name: encoding
nested_items.description: The character set used by the data set. Can be ASCII, EBCDIC, or unknown.

nested_items.name: primaryKey
nested_items.description: The primary key of the data set.

nested_items.name: length
nested_items.description: A strictly positive integer value representing the length of the primary key.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A name for the Primary Key.

nested_items.name: offset
nested_items.description: A positive integer value representing the offset to mark the start of the primary key in the record byte array.

nested_items.name: recordFormat
nested_items.description: The record format of the data set.

nested_items.name: fileSize
nested_items.description: File size of the dataset.

nested_items.name: lastReferencedTime
nested_items.description: The last time the data set was referenced.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last time the data set was updated.

nested_items.name: location
nested_items.description: The location where the data set is stored.

nested_items.name: recordLength
nested_items.description: The length of records in the data set.
